body.name: GroTawel Pillow Speaker Bone Conduction Stereo, Mini Portable Bluetooth Sleep Headphones for Deep Sleeping, Insomnia White Noise Machine for Side Sleepers-White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 mins
features: 【Bone Conduction Technology】 This pillow speaker uses bone conduction technology, connected by Bluetooth, without having to wear it can clearly transmit sound to the ear, say goodbye to the earache caused by headphones.

【Long Service Time】The pillow side sleep speaker is equipped with type-C USB fast charging, which can be fully charged in about 3 hours. It can work for 20 hours on a single charge, bringing you more continuous music enjoyment.

【Better Help to Fall Asleep】This pillow speaker is specifically tailored to soothe sleep, bone conduction Bluetooth sleep speaker as far as possible placed in the center of the pillow bottom, side sleep, ear fit the pillow bottom of the sleep speaker in the middle of the best results. Tip: Volume adjustment via Phone.

【Timing Settings】This pillow speaker comes with two timing designs of 30 minutes and 60 minutes, as well as two modes of white noise and Bluetooth, and comes with 4 nature white noise sound sources, allowing you to freely switch according to different needs.

【Portable and Light Weight】This pillow speaker is only 2.12 ounces, and its slim and compact design allows you to carry it with you at home, in the office, or during travel, keeping you away from insomnia and improving your sleep quality.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.3 3.3 out of 5 stars 39 ratings 3.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #872 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers #5,397 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: An excellent speaker for children and adults. You can control it from your phone and not disturb your child when he falls asleep. You can listen to the sound without disturbing others if the speaker lies under the pillow in the center. It’s a little unusual that there are only two control buttons, but this has its advantages. It’s a pity that we can’t recommend that designers make buttons more recognizable to the touch, but this is a matter of habit. The speaker is very, very pleasant to the touch, for me this is an important aspect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Charlie Brown Emulator
reviews.reviewText: Do you miss Charlie Brown movies? Well any movie is a Charlie Brown movie with this speaker the bass is horrible and takes over everything. If you have it next to your head then it works fine. But so dose any other speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works VERY well!
reviews.reviewText: This was a Christmas gift for my teenaged granddaughter. She LOVES it. She tells me the sound quality is great, and it's working "as it should". She added that she likes the convenience and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This pillow speaker actually vibrates the whole time it is on
reviews.reviewText: The speaker vibrates so badly the sound is all distorted. Useless

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for bedtime so I can listen to old movies on Prime as I fall asleep. The sound always bothers my spouse, but I can not sleep without some sound so I was very hopeful about this. This will not work thru a heavy memory foam pillow, so I just put it on top of the pillow and rest some part of my skull against it and the sound comes thru perfectly. Impressive! Spouse can not hear it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is very good, it helps with sleep, and it can automatically shut down, which is very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Barely any sound
reviews.reviewText: The sound volume is sooo low even with my phone volume turned all the way up. Can barely hear it even with my ear pressed against the pillow. Forget about laying on your back with your head resting on the pillow as they show in the video.Waste of moneyIf I could give it zero stars I would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Vibration hurts my ears/teeth
reviews.reviewText: I really love the concept for this speaker. I purchased it during the holidays when advertised as being on sale. (See the “sale” is still happening… the price is unchanged.) This item does not sound very loud but can be heard clearly when a pillow is sandwiched between your and the speaker. My complaint is that the speaker constantly vibrates and emits a high, near silent buzzing. It is so unpleasant, I can actually feel the buzzing in my ears and teeth. If I listen to it look enough, I get a headache. This is quite a deal breaker for me and super disappointing.
